components.title: Technological Advancements in Home Cleaning
components.content: The home cleaning industry is undergoing a digital transformation with the adoption of app-based services and emerging technologies like IoT, AI, and robotic cleaning. These innovations are enhancing service efficiency and customer satisfaction.
insights: Over 70% of bookings are made through digital platforms.
Robotic cleaning market to grow at 21.5% CAGR.
components.conclusion: Technology is a key driver in the evolution of the home cleaning industry, offering new opportunities for growth and efficiency.
